title: Boy, 12, shot himself in West Price Hill home
content: WEST PRICE HILL, Ohio (WKRC) -- Police were called a house on Virgil Road in West Price Hill late Sunday night.That's where they found a 12-year-old boy who shot himself while playing with a gun.He was shot in the finger and his side.The boy was taken to Children's Hospital and no charges have been filed at this time.Follow us on Twitter @Local12 and LIKE us on Facebook for updates!
